CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 1, 1941, pg. 12 reads: "Cavalryman - First Class Private Roger Taliaferro, of 6422 Apple Street...of Mrs. and Mrs. John Taliaferro...visited his parents here last...during a fifteen day furlough from the Tenth Cavalry...G, stationed at Camp Fu...Kansas. He has made a...utation there in the USO...Soldiers Service Club, he...been assistant recreational...tor at Fort Riley. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Soldier Rodger Taliaferro wearing cavalry uniform with boots and spurs, posed with one foot on bumper of car on city sidewalk
